visionContent1: At ज्ञान भाण्डार (Jñāna Bhāṇḍāra) Library, we're not just about books. We're about creating an unparalleled experience that inspires curiosity and empowers every individual.
visionContent2: Seamlessly blending technology and tradition, we offer a world of resources at your fingertips, pushing the boundaries of what a library can be.

vastCollection.title: Vast Collection
vastCollection.description: Explore over 100,000 meticulously curated books, e-books, and media.

engageConnect.title: Engage & Connect
engageConnect.description: Join dynamic events and programs designed to inspire and connect.

alwaysAccessible.title: Always Accessible
alwaysAccessible.description: Seamless access anytime, anywhere. The library, always at your service.

precisionSearch.title: Precision Search
precisionSearch.description: Advanced search tools, tailored to your needs, delivering results effortlessly.

legacyContent1: Since 2024, ज्ञान भाण्डार (Jñāna Bhāṇḍāra) Library has been at the forefront of knowledge, continually evolving to meet the needs of our community. From a single room of books to a state-of-the-art facility, we are proud of our legacy.
legacyContent2: Through decades of innovation, we’ve transformed the way people interact with information, always striving to exceed expectations.

volunteerWithUs.title: Volunteer With Us
volunteerWithUs.description: Become part of a passionate team and make a meaningful impact. From program assistance to behind-the-scenes support, your contribution is invaluable.

supportUs.title: Support Us
supportUs.description: Your generosity drives innovation. Help us expand, evolve, and reach new heights with your donation.
